author: Shane Brinkman-Davis Delamore
description: The Standard Library for JavaScript that aught to be.
name: @art-suite/art-core-terminal-colors

scripts.build:
rsync -av --exclude='*.caf' ./source/ ./build/
caf -m -c source -o build
npm run nn
scripts.build-clean:
# BUILD CLEAN START
#   - building into: build-temp
#
rm -rf ./__build-old__
rsync -av --exclude='*.caf' ./source/ ./build-temp/
caf -m -c source -o build-temp
npm run nn

nn build-temp/*

# BUILD CLEAN FINIALIZING
#  - replace old build in:   build
#  - with new build from:    build-temp
#
mv build __build-old__
mv build-temp build
rm -rf ./__build-old__
